body_html: Closing this and will re-open a PR just with fixes to ATen. Note @ebetica one advantage of these modules is that we have this ExpandingArray class which means you can pass e.g. 2 to MaxPool2d for the stride and it will expand to {2, 2}. Probably we should add this to ATen itself
body_text: Closing this and will re-open a PR just with fixes to ATen. Note @ebetica one advantage of these modules is that we have this ExpandingArray class which means you can pass e.g. 2 to MaxPool2d for the stride and it will expand to {2, 2}. Probably we should add this to ATen itself
body: Closing this and will re-open a PR just with fixes to ATen. Note @ebetica one advantage of these modules is that we have this `ExpandingArray` class which means you can pass e.g. `2` to `MaxPool2d` for the stride and it will expand to `{2, 2}`. Probably we should add this to ATen itself
